archimate:Resource.name: Protocol Converter
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB is responsible for transforming data across industry standard protocols. For example, a JSON to SOAP conversion or a SOAP/HTTP to a SOAP/JMS or SOAP/Message Queue conversion would be responsibilities of this ABB.

properties.value: This ABB is responsible for transforming data across industry standard protocols. For example, a JSON to SOAP conversion or a SOAP/HTTP to a SOAP/JMS or SOAP/Message Queue conversion would be responsibilities of this ABB.
